title: At Work
description: Improve your Japanese speaking skills with phrases typically used in a work environment. Focus on clear pronunciation and professional intonation.
instructions: Below is a list of phrases you might use in a work setting in Japanese.
Aim for clear and professional pronunciation.
Maintain a conversational and steady pace.
After recording, listen to your playback and compare it to the text.
Pay attention to intonation, clarity, and fluency in Japanese.
Repeat the recording process as necessary to improve your Japanese speaking skills.
